attributes.action: sugest MPs take a cut in saleries in line with those most workers are taking to keep thier jobs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current climate more and more worker across the board are having to take a cut in wages and or hours to retain their jobs. MPs rather than scamming extra allowances and voting pay rises should offer to bear some of the effect along with their constituents. Do any of you realise what working life is really about these days? Stop feathering your nest and do something to help.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
